titleStmt.title: Thystorye of the right noble and worthy knyght parys and of the fayre vyenne the dolphyns doughter of vyennoys
Paris et Vienne. English
titleStmt.author: Pierre, de la Cépède, 15th cent.
Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

publicationStmt.publisher: Prentyd by me Gerard Leeu in the towne of andewarpe,
publicationStmt.date: in the yere of our lord. M.cccc. fowre skore and twelve [1492]: a[n]d fynysshed the xxiij. day of Iuyne]

notesStmt.note: A translation by William Caxton of "Paris et Vienne" by Pierre de la Cépède, the French version of a tale found in numerous European versions.
Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
